import axios from "axios" import useSwr from "swr" import { reactLocalStorage } from 'reactjs-localstorage'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; export default function Footer() { const [selectedCurrency, setSelectedCurrency] = useState(); const fetcher = async (url) => await axios.get(url).then(res => res.data) const { data } = useSwr(`${process.env.API_URL}static/config`, fetcher, { revalidateOnFocus: false }) useEffect(() => { let currency = reactLocalStorage.getObject("currency") console.log(currency) if (currency.id) { setSelectedCurrency(currency.id) } else { let defaultCurrency = data.filter(d => d.value === 1) reactLocalStorage.setObject('currency', defaultCurrency[0]); setSelectedCurrency(defaultCurrency[0].id) } }, [data]) const setCurrency = (e) => { let currency = data.filter(d => parseInt(e.target.value) === d.id) reactLocalStorage.setObject('currency', currency[0]); window.location.reload() } return (
